roleset.name: decode
roleset.note: DECIPHER-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on ULA. No VNcls. (from decipher.01-v)

roles.note: Sometimes the thing being deciphered is somewhat ambiguous as to whether it is the start or end state-- default to arg1. see examples. (from decipher.01-v)

example.name: corpus example
example.text: The work of [Jean Francois Champollion -LRB- 1790-1832 -RRB-]-1 in *trace*-1 deciphering hieroglyphics from the Rosetta Stone was an astonishing accomplishment

example.name: somewhat ambiguous
example.text: After I finally deciphered what the hell he was saying, I tried to ignore it.
example.arg: what the hell he was saying

example.name: decoded data as core, encrypted data as oblique
example.text: These people, with their quiet-smiling, quiet-frowning faces, connect one instantly with the stories out of the past that-1 [*trace*-1]-2 may be deciphered *trace*-2 from the stained glass windows on the stair-landings which deal with various aspects of early days.
example.arg: that -> the stories out of the past
from the stained glass windows on the stair-landings which deal with various aspects of early days

example.name: decoded data as oblique, encrypted data as core
example.text: the green view screen deciphered the message into readable text
